panels.description: Percentage of successful requests excluding 404 and 499 status codes
panels.title: % Success

panels.description: Total number of requests in the selected time range

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Total 2xx responses in the selected time range

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"2.*", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__interval])) or vector(0)

panels.title: HTTP 2xx

panels.description: Total 3xx responses in the selected time range

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"3.*", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__interval])) or vector(0)

panels.title: HTTP 3xx

panels.description: Total 4xx responses in the selected time range

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"4.*", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__interval])) or vector(0)

panels.title: HTTP 4xx

panels.description: Total 5xx responses in the selected time range

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"5.*", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__interval])) or vector(0)

panels.title: HTTP 5xx

panels.description: Overall request rate in requests per second

targets.expr: sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: HTTP status codes over time with color-coded status classes

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__interval])) by (status)

panels.title: HTTP Status Codes Over Time

panels.description: Request count broken down by HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__interval])) by (method)

panels.title: Requests by Method

panels.description: Latency percentiles (P50, P75, P90, P95, P99) for the selected ingress, excluding 404/500/304/499 status codes
panels.title: Latency Percentiles

panels.description: Heatmap showing the distribution of request durations across histogram buckets
panels.title: Latency Heatmap

panels.description: Breakdown of 4xx and 5xx error status codes over time

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"[4-5].*", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__interval])) by (status)

panels.title: Error Status Breakdown

panels.description: Error rate (4xx + 5xx) broken down by HTTP method to identify which methods are failing

targets.expr: sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"[4-5].*", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__interval])) by (method)

panels.title: Error Rate by Method

panels.description: Number of pods in ready state matching the selected ingress
panels.title: Running Pods

panels.description: Number of pods not in ready state matching the selected ingress
panels.title: Failed / Missing Pods

panels.description: Total pod restarts in the selected time range
panels.title: Pod Restarts

panels.description: CPU utilisation as a percentage of resource limits
panels.title: CPU % Util

panels.description: Memory utilisation as a percentage of resource limits
panels.title: Mem % Util

panels.description: Current request rate over the last 5 minutes

targets.expr: sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]))

panels.title: Request Rate (now)

panels.description: Current P95 latency over the last 5 minutes
panels.title: P95 Latency (now)

panels.description: Full breakdown of request counts by status code and HTTP method for the selected time range
panels.title: Status Code Breakdown Table
